title: How to post copyrighted music on Instagram - Quora

response.answer_text: Instagram and copyright have walked together from the birth of the social media giant. Most artists, such as photographers, singers, etc. are a victim of such issues. Instagram has made it clear in its terms and conditions about the use of a copied image, video, or music. You cannot post someone posted images/videos/music on Instagram. But, here are some tips to post copyright music on Instagram: 1. Give credit to owners 2. Appeal if you want to use the music 3. Make some changes to the music 4. Use copyrighted free music for your videos So, these are the tips that help you know how to avoid copyright on Instagram.

You cannot use someone else's content without permission. Doing so is illegal copyright infringement. And ALL recorded music is protected by copyright in the U.S. Look, if you just need music that comes with permission to use it in videos, try this: Where can I find royalty-free background music for inclusion in videos and short films?
